pathAssistantSteps.info:
Status Overview

Contact Identified

  • Represents when a rep has identified the DM.

Status Overview

Non-prospect

  • Represents when an Mx is not a viable Mx to sell to now or ever (i.e., permanently closed, is not a business but is a person's home, etc).
  • “Disposition Reason” picklist should be presented to user automatically upon selection of the “Disqualified” status

Status Overview

  • Marketing Qualified Lead
    • Represents when a lead has been qualified through Marketing Platforms or Digital Campaigns.

Status Overview

Disengaged

  • Represents when an Mx is not currently interested in DoorDash, but may be a viable Mx to sell to in future.

Status Overview

Initiating Communication

  • Represents when a rep has reached out (via phone, email, text, social media, etc.) but has not yet gotten in touch with / identified the DM.

Status Overview

Unexplored

  • Default status on lead creation
  • Represents when a lead has not been reached out to yet.
